name: 迈克尔·乔凡诺夫斯基
name_full: 迈克尔·乔凡诺夫斯基 Michael Jovanovski
introduction: Michael Jovanovski or JOVO is the middle child and only actor of the three Jovanovski brothers. Michael was born in Windsor, Ontario Canada on November 17,1969 to Macedonian immigrant parents, Stojce (Steve) and Srebra (Sandy) Jovanovski. He is also a production designer and decorator and has had a long, successful career behind the camera.
